TeraSwitch is a hosting provider based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. We are an established host who been in business since 2003, providing premium infrastructure as a service products. We focus on individualized support and customized scalability for any need you may have.

Why Pittsburgh?
Our Pittsburgh-based hosting offer is geographically located in-between all major US north-eastern markets, giving you excellent network connectivity to New York City, Toronto, Chicago, and Virginia, all from one location! We maintain our own network, as well as all our own equipment, and provide all US-based support out of our Pittsburgh datacenter.

FAQ

Do you offer PTR/reverse DNS on your IPs?

Yes, we can set PTR addresses for your machines! Simply open up a ticket and we’ll get your PTR records set.

What payment options are available?

We can accept credit or debit cards, as well as paypal payments.

What is your support availability?

Our support team is here for you, 24/7 via our ticket system, NOC telephone number, and email support. When you reach out to us for support, you’ll be talking directly with our engineers, no waiting in long ticket queues and dealing with escalations.

Setup time?

Our setup portal automatically provisions your server on the fly. There is a 10-15 minute time window for the OS to be installed to your bare metal server.

Have additional questions? Feel free to reach out to us any time!
